security_audit.summary: This is a legitimate presentation generation skill with no malicious capabilities. It creates PowerPoint files locally using standard libraries (pptxgenjs) with built-in accessibility compliance. No network calls, data exfiltration, or suspicious code patterns detected.

content.user_title: Generate Professional PowerPoint Presentations with Accessibility
content.value_statement: Creating professional presentations takes hours and often fails accessibility standards. This skill generates enterprise-grade PowerPoint decks with WCAG 2.1 AA compliance in minutes.
actual_capabilities: Generates 30+ slide presentations with consistent design
Ensures WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility compliance (4.5:1 contrast ratio)
Creates data visualizations including charts and tables
Applies constraint-based design system with predefined colors and fonts
Produces speaker notes and alt text for screen readers
Validates quality with automated accessibility scanning
limitations: Requires content outline in JSON format
Limited to predefined slide layouts (title, content, two-column, chart)
Design system uses fixed color palette and Calibri font
Maximum recommended 40 slides for audience attention
Output file size should remain under 50MB

use_cases.title: Board Meeting Presentations
use_cases.description: Create quarterly business reviews and board decks with professional design and data visualizations

use_cases.title: Technical Documentation Slides
use_cases.description: Generate training materials and technical reports with consistent formatting and accessibility compliance

use_cases.title: Client Proposal Decks
use_cases.description: Build persuasive presentations with charts, tables, and professional layouts for client meetings

prompt_templates.title: Basic Presentation
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a presentation about our Q4 results with title slide, agenda, 3 key metrics slides with charts, summary, and next steps

prompt_templates.title: Board Deck
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a board presentation with executive summary, financial charts, market analysis with data tables, and strategic recommendations

prompt_templates.title: Training Materials
prompt_templates.prompt: Build training slides covering system architecture, process workflows with diagrams, and assessment questions

prompt_templates.title: Sales Proposal
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a sales deck with problem statement, solution overview, ROI calculations with charts, implementation timeline, and pricing

output_examples.input: Create a quarterly business review with revenue charts and market analysis
output: Market share table with competitor comparison

best_practices: Provide structured content outline with clear section headings and data points for optimal results
Include specific chart types and data values to ensure accurate visualizations
Review accessibility report and fix any contrast or alt text issues before finalizing
anti_patterns: Avoid vague content requests without structure - provide clear outline and data
Do not exceed 40 slides as audience attention drops significantly beyond this point
Never skip the accessibility validation phase - it ensures professional compliance

faq.question: Is this compatible with all PowerPoint versions?
faq.answer: Yes, generates standard .pptx files compatible with PowerPoint 2007+ and alternative viewers

faq.question: What are the slide count and file size limits?
faq.answer: Supports 30+ slides optimally, maximum 40 slides. Keep file size under 50MB for best performance

faq.question: Can I integrate my company branding and colors?
faq.answer: Currently uses predefined design system. Custom branding requires modifying the design system configuration

faq.question: How does the skill ensure data safety?
faq.answer: All processing happens locally. No content is sent to external servers or stored permanently

faq.question: What if the accessibility scan finds issues?
faq.answer: The skill will identify issues with specific fixes. Re-run generation after adjusting colors or adding alt text

faq.question: How does this compare to manual PowerPoint creation?
faq.answer: Automates design consistency and accessibility compliance, saving 2-3 hours while ensuring professional standards
